params.pair: The address of the liquidity pool

returns.left: The closest tick to the left of the current tick
returns.right: The closest tick to the right of the current tick

returns._0: True if a/b > c/d, false otherwise

params.pair: The address of the liquidity pool

returns._0: The current tick of the pool as an int24

params.pair: The address of the liquidity pool

returns._0: The current price as a uint256

params.pair: The address of the liquidity pool

returns._0: The tick spacing as an int24

params.pair: The address of the liquidity pool
params.prices: An array of prices to convert

returns._0: An array of the closest ticks corresponding to the given prices

params.pair: The address of the liquidity pool

returns._0: The price corresponding to the given tick as a uint256

closestTicksForCurrentTick(address).notice: Get the closest ticks (such as left <= current tick < right) to the current tick of a liquidity pool

getCurrentPoolTick(address).notice: Get the current tick of a liquidity pool

getCurrentPrice(address).notice: Get the current price of a liquidity pool

getTickSpacing(address).notice: Get the tick spacing for a given liquidity pool

priceToClosestTick(address,uint256[]).notice: Convert prices to their closest ticks

tickToPrice(address,int24).notice: Convert a tick to its corresponding price
